prd.overview: Pesenin! is a lightweight Warehouse Management System (WMS) tailored for small home-based businesses (e.g., frozen dimsum mentai sellers). The goal is to simplify inventory, order, and production management while being accessible via mobile-first design.
target_users: Small UMKM operators without dedicated warehouse staff
objectives: Track raw material and product inventory
Calculate maximum production capacity based on available ingredients (BOM)
Provide expiry tracking for raw materials and products
Allow quick order input and automatic stock checking

in_scope: Production calculation based on available stock

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Add, update, and view stock of raw materials and finished goods with unit type and expiry date.

features.name: BOM & Production Calculator
features.description: Define per-portion recipe (raw materials and quantities). Calculate max producible portions based on stock and identify bottleneck materials.

features.name: Order Management
features.description: Record orders manually. Check stock availability automatically based on BOM.

features.name: Expiry Tracking
features.description: Store expiry date per stock batch. Alert when expiry is near.

features.name: Low Stock Alerts
features.description: Notify user when stock falls below configured threshold.

features.name: Responsive Web UI
features.description: Mobile-first UI optimized for ~375px viewport, responsive up to 768px.

user_stories: As a seller, I want to input raw material stock with expiry dates so I can manage freshness.
As a seller, I want to define BOM per product so I can calculate production capacity.
As a seller, I want to know if I have enough ingredients to fulfill an order before confirming it.
As a seller, I want to get alerts when stock is low so I can restock in time.
acceptance_criteria: User can add raw material stock with name, quantity, unit, and expiry date.
User can define BOM for a product with raw material quantities.
System can calculate maximum portions producible based on current stock.
System can list which materials are short for a given order quantity.
UI is fully functional on mobile and tablet screen sizes.

web.architecture: SPA (Single Page Application) consuming REST API

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.description: Overview of stock, low-stock alerts, upcoming expiries

pages.name: Materials
pages.description: List, add, edit, delete raw materials

pages.name: Products
pages.description: List products and define BOM per product
